title: Exploring the Pedestrian Traffic Data and Developmental Activity Footprint to Map and Predict Graffiti Vandalism and Waste Dumping Hotspots across the City of Melbourne
name: Mapping Graffiti and Illegal Waste Dumping Hotspots in Melbourne
description: This use case works with four differe datasets which includes pedestrian traffic data, customer service request data and developmental activity footprint data. These datasets are furthere explored and analyzed to identify patterns , trends and relationships that exists. We use the geospatial information for mapping and preedicting the hotspots as well.
